resources.string: We’ll use your postcode to add a link from the app home page to your local council’s website
We only use your postcode to find out what your local council is. It’s not saved or shared anywhere. You can enter a different postcode at any time on the app home page.
Add a link to your local council’s website
District, borough and city councils are usually responsible for services like rubbish, council tax and housing
Services in your area are provided by 2 local councils
County councils are usually responsible for services like education, social care and transport
Enter a postcode in the correct format
We could not find a council for this postcode. Check the postcode and try again.
This page is not working. Try again later.
You are not connected to the internet. Reconnect and try again.
Your postcode %1$s is shared by more than one local council
We’ll use your address to find your local council
You can now access your local council’s website from the bottom of the app home page.
Services in your area are provided by 2 local councils
Different local councils are responsible for different services.
You can now access your local councils’ websites from the bottom of the app home page.
